Expand shorten URLs in MATLAB

Sometimes I use MATLAB scripts to analyze Twitter posts. One issue is that Twitter uses shorten URLs started with t.co for the links, such as retweets. To get the original URL, we need to determine the final redirected endpoint by using an URL expander.

How to find the installation path of Windows store apps for default program settings in Windows 10

Do you want to change a Windows store app as the default program for opening files? Are you looking for the root folder of the Windows Store app for File Association? Here is a procedure of locating the path from the Windows Registry and setting it for a specific file type. In this article, I used the draw.io application as a demonstration.
